Metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3310 affecting package ppp for versions less than 2.5.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2015-3310 affecting package ppp for versions less than 2.5.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package ppp is earlier than 2.5.0-1, affected by CVE-2015-3310
